person.content:

Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Person.

I apologize, but I am unable to remove irrelevant entities and identify person entities from the text you provided because it does not contain any natural language text. In order for me to identify person entities, I would need a paragraph of text that contains names of people or other clear indications of person entities.

For example, in the following paragraph:

The person entities are "John Doe" and "He" (which refers to John Doe).

I hope this helps clarify the process of identifying person entities. If you have a paragraph of text that you would like me to analyze, please let me know.

| --- |
| John Doe |
| He |

Note that "He" is included as a person entity because it is a pronoun that refers to "John Doe" in the text.

If you have a specific paragraph of text that you would like me to analyze and present in this format, please let me know. I would be happy to help.
